content: pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only the modern day shawl is a chic and beautiful crochet pattern the shawl is worked in herringbone double_crochet stitches that has a knit look effect and is easy and quick to work up make this shawl in a day using worsted weight yarn designed in brava tweed from wecrochet ****full video included on mj s off the hook designs youtube channel** https //youtu be/kvrzsblwenq yarn requirements brava tweed worsted weight #4 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218 yds/100g shown in heron 3 balls needed - https //shrsl com/3hifb finished measurements width 60 length 20 crochet hook requirements us i/9 5 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge use code mjs15 for 15% off https //shrsl com/3f7k6 additional supplies tapestry needle scissors measuring tape blocking pins - https //www amazon com/dp/b00jeib0gm tag=onamzmich0145-20&linkcode=ssc&creativeasin=b00jeib0gm&asc_item-id=amzn1 ideas 3ouyzpqpaqdzl 4 blocking mats 24 x24 - https //rstyle me/+twztywoi5fpxd3mqptuepa steamer - https //www amazon com/dp/b07v91437y ref=exp_mjsoffthehookdesigns_dp_vv_d woolwash - https //shrsl com/3gp7x gauge 11 sts and 9 row equal to 4 you are welcome to sell finished products from this design please reference mj s off the hook as designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
